trans-unit.source: Defines a credential policy to be used for resource requests that are made using <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en policy for legitimasjonen som skal brukes for ressursen forespørsler ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>og de avledede klassene.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: This policy allows credentials to be sent only if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client that is making the request.
trans-unit.target: Denne policyen lar legitimasjon sendes bare hvis den forespurte ressursen er i samme domene som klienten som sender forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: For many applications this is the optimal policy because it prevents network credentials from being sent with requests for resources that are not on the intranet.
trans-unit.target: For mange programmer er optimale policyen fordi den hindrer at nettverkslegitimasjon sendes med forespørsler for ressurser som ikke finnes på intranettet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy> policies are invoked only if the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>policyer startes bare hvis det <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>eller <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>som er forbundet med forespørselen med rettigheter som ikke er `null`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.ICredentialPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials.
trans-unit.target: Denne policyen har ingen innvirkning på forespørsler som ikke angir legitimasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy policy.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy policyen.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that handles authentication for the request will invoke the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> method before performing the authentication.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>som håndterer godkjenning for forespørselen som skal aktivere den <xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A>metoden før du utfører godkjenningen.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> </xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If the requested resource is in a different domain than the client, the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A> method returns `false`, and authentication is not performed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den forespurte ressursen er i et annet domene enn klienten, den <xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A>metoden returnerer `false`, og godkjenning er ikke utført.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy.ShouldSendCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: This policy affects all instances of <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> with non-null credentials in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Denne policyen påvirker alle forekomster av <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>med ikke-null-legitimasjon i gjeldende programdomenet.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests.
trans-unit.target: Policyen kan ikke overstyres på enkelte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.IntranetZoneCredentialPolicy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Applications use this constructor to create objects that can be used to set the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Programmer bruker denne konstruktøren til å opprette objekter som kan brukes til å angi den <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the client's credentials are sent with a request for a resource that was made using <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om klientens legitimasjon sendes med en forespørsel om en ressurs som ble opprettet med <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Applications do not call this method directly; it is called by the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> that is responsible for performing authentication with the server.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kall ikke denne metoden direkte. kalles opp av den <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>som er ansvarlig for å utføre godkjenning med serveren.</xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `false`, the <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule> will not authenticate the client to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer `false`, <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>vil ikke bli godkjent klienten til serveren.</xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: This method is called only for requests that specify credentials or use a <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> object that specifies credentials.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bare for forespørsler som angi legitimasjon, eller bruk en <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>objekt som angir legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that will receive the request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som vil bli forespørselen.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> that represents the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>som representerer den forespurte ressursen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> that will be sent with the request if this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>som sendes i forespørselen hvis metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"></xref> that will conduct the authentication, if authentication is required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.IAuthenticationModule"> </xref> som vil utføre godkjenning, hvis godkjenning er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested resource is in the same domain as the client making the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den forespurte ressursen er i samme domene som klienten sender forespørselen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
